description:
My place is close to Prospect Park, Pels Pie Co., Oaxaca Taqueria, De Hot Pot, Bluebird, Botanical Gardens, Q,B,2,5 Express Trains. You’ll love my place because of the views, the ambiance and , the neighborhood, . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

The apartment have about sleeping beds and air mattresses are available also upon early request. Quiet neighborhood and 2 blocks from prospect park

The entire apartment

Anytime if needed, 24/7 text and call Availabilty

Prospect park is literally two blocks away , Brooklyn botanical gardens & zoo is walking distance away. Two deciduous coffee and cake shops are across the street from the building.

2,5,Q,B TRAINS 2 stops into manhattan . 2,5 trains are around the corner and Q,B trains are about a block away.

Bar on corner to watch sports events, great shops and food in the neighborhood. Extremely quiet and safe street in BK
name: Elegant Entire apartment prospect lefferts garden
review: Was nice. Host was welcoming. Place is cozy.
